title: Timing Is Everything
description: A surprise for Tasha's kinky new boyfriend turns into a compromising position when her roommate's plans fall through. Now she's cuffed to the bed, he's due any minute, and Katrina would just as soon start without him.Download FREE at Smashwords in all ebook formats! http://www.smashwords.com/books/view/...
